mapper.select: select o_ref, o_title, o_sender, o_regdate, o_deadline, deliveryState from ordering where o_sender=#{o_sender} order by o_regdate desc
select o_ref, o_title, o_sender, o_regdate, o_deadline, deliveryState from ordering where o_sender != 'admin' order by o_deadline asc
select o_ref, o_title, o_sender, o_regdate, o_deadline, deliveryState from ordering where o_sender='admin' order by o_regdate desc
select o_reStep, pro_name, pro_container, pro_volume, pro_count from orderingPro where o_ref = #{o_ref}
mapper.insert: insert into ordering(o_ref, o_title, o_deadline, o_regdate, o_sender, o_receiver, o_note, deliveryState, o_count) values(Ordering_o_ref.NEXTVAL, #{o_title}, #{o_deadline}, SYSDATE, #{o_sender}, #{o_receiver},#{o_note},'배송준비중', #{o_count})
insert into orderingPro(o_ref, o_reStep, pro_name, pro_container, pro_volume, pro_count) values(#{o_ref}, #{o_reStep}, #{pro_name}, #{pro_container}, #{pro_volume}, #{pro_count})
